resource.chars:
Gov. School of Mines, Jermyn St
July 25 1857
It appears to me to be very 
desirable that the accompanying 
paper on the “Two methods of reproduction 
in Daphnia“ should be printed 
in the Philosophical Transactions 
since the author has carefully 
worked out his subject and 
has made a valuable 
contribution to the physiology 
of Reproduction -
